expo.name: Hoboscan
expo.description: It can extract text from images and allows you to translate to multiple other languages

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: To upload images taken by the camera to our api to scan for text, images are automatically deleted once scanned.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: To upload images chosen by the user to our api to scan for text, images are automatically deleted once scanned.
